This is a list, based on functionality, of the macros which have an alternate _r name, representing a reentry into the BOOST_PP_FOR looping construct:

repetition

  • BOOST_PP_DEDUCE_R
list
  • BOOST_PP_LIST_ENUM_R
  • BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_R
  • BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_PRODUCT_R
  • BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_R
  • BOOST_PP_LIST_TO_SEQ_R
  • BOOST_PP_LIST_TO_TUPLE_R
seq
  • BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH_PRODUCT_R
  • BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH_R
base
  • BOOST_PP_FOR_R
